sentences.english: And this is the mangled aftermath of a massive accident in France.
sentences.chinese: 而這是發生在法國的重大交通事故的嚴重後果。

sentences.english: If serious subsequences are caused, the infringing organ shall pay a proper amount of consolation money for the mental distress.
sentences.chinese: 造成嚴重後果的，應當支付相應的精神損害撫慰金。

sentences.english: The drainage of teachers brings serious effects to the basic education.
sentences.chinese: 教師流失對該縣基礎教育造成了嚴重後果。

sentences.english: In fact, such patchwork machine integration can have dire consequences.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這種批量化的集成很可能導致嚴重後果。

sentences.english: But it does have value and its absence has consequences.
sentences.chinese: 但道德確實有其價值，缺失的話會造成嚴重後果。

sentences.english: You will hold up the responsibility for all the serious consequences arising therefrom.
sentences.chinese: 你要承擔由此而產生的一切嚴重後果。

sentences.english: Back to serious consequences, I have finally come up.
sentences.chinese: 回撥的嚴重後果，我終於體會到了。
